items.title: Awesome Tall Stack
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Markdown
items.content_text:
### CMS / Blogs

*   [Pelican](https://blog.getpelican.com/) - Static site generator that requires no database or server-side logic.

### Libraries / C

*   [cmark (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/commonmark/cmark) - CommonMark parsing and rendering library and program in C.

### Libraries / Python

*   [PyMdown Extensions](https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/) - A collection of extensions for Python Markdown.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Postgres
items.content_text:
### Contents / GUI

*   [DataRow](https://www.datarow.com/) - Cross-platform SQL Client for Amazon Redshift: Simple, Effortless, Extensible.
*   [PostgresCompare](https://www.postgrescompare.com) - Cross-platform database comparison and deployment tool (Commercial Software).
items.content_html:
Contents / GUI

  • DataRow - Cross-platform SQL Client for Amazon Redshift: Simple, Effortless, Extensible.
  • PostgresCompare - Cross-platform database comparison and deployment tool (Commercial Software).

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Miscellaneous

*   [react-pdf (⭐10k)](https://github.com/wojtekmaj/react-pdf) - Display PDFs in your React app as easily as if they were images.

### Form Components / Date / Time picker

*   [react-calendar (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/wojtekmaj/react-calendar) - Ultimate calendar for your React app.
*   [react-date-picker (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/wojtekmaj/react-date-picker) - A date picker for your React app.
items.content_html:
Miscellaneous

  • react-pdf (⭐10k) - Display PDFs in your React app as easily as if they were images.

Form Components / Date / Time picker

  • react-calendar (⭐3.7k) - Ultimate calendar for your React app.
  • react-date-picker (⭐1.3k) - A date picker for your React app.

items.title: Awesome Devsecops
items.content_text:
### Intentionally Vulnerable Applications / Ansible

*   [Cfngoat (⭐93)](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/cfngoat) - *Bridgecrew* - Cloud Formation templates for creating stacks of intentionally insecure services in AWS. Ideal for testing the Cloud Formation Infrastructure as Code Analysis tools above.
*   [Terragoat (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/terragoat) - *Bridgecrew* - Terraform templates for creating stacks of intentionally insecure services in AWS, Azure and GCP. Ideal for testing the Terraform Infrastructure as Code Analysis tools above.
items.content_html:
Intentionally Vulnerable Applications / Ansible

  • Cfngoat (⭐93) - Bridgecrew - Cloud Formation templates for creating stacks of intentionally insecure services in AWS. Ideal for testing the Cloud Formation Infrastructure as Code Analysis tools above.
  • Terragoat (⭐1.2k) - Bridgecrew - Terraform templates for creating stacks of intentionally insecure services in AWS, Azure and GCP. Ideal for testing the Terraform Infrastructure as Code Analysis tools above.

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

*   [evostra (⭐274)](https://github.com/alirezamika/evostra) - A fast Evolution Strategy implementation in Python.

### Tools / Misc

*   [Pythonizr](https://pythonizr.com) - An online tool to generate boilerplate machine learning code that uses scikit-learn.
items.content_html:
Python / General-Purpose Machine Learning

  • evostra (⭐274) - A fast Evolution Strategy implementation in Python.

Tools / Misc

  • Pythonizr - An online tool to generate boilerplate machine learning code that uses scikit-learn.

items.title: Awesome Raspberry Pi
items.content_text:
### Projects

*   [Internet Chronometer (⭐116)](https://github.com/rothman857/chronometer) - Turn your Raspberry Pi in to an Internet Chronometer.
*   [Pi-KVM (⭐9.1k)](https://github.com/pikvm/pikvm) - DIY KVM over IP to manage remote computers via Web UI or VNC with FullHD video, mouse, virtual drive, IPMI, Wake-on-LAN and many other things.
items.content_html:
Projects

  • Internet Chronometer (⭐116) - Turn your Raspberry Pi in to an Internet Chronometer.
  • Pi-KVM (⭐9.1k) - DIY KVM over IP to manage remote computers via Web UI or VNC with FullHD video, mouse, virtual drive, IPMI, Wake-on-LAN and many other things.
